```{r}
election_all <- read_csv("clean_data/elections_all.csv")
```


# Initial Regression
```{r}
election_all <- election_all %>% 
  mutate(crisis = ifelse(is.na(`crisis type`), 0, 1),
         percent_turnout = ifelse(percent_turnout < 1, 100 * percent_turnout, 
                                  percent_turnout))

reg1 <- lm(percent_turnout ~ crisis, data = election_all)

stargazer(reg1, type = "text")
```

# By Crisis Type

```{r}
reg1 <- lm(percent_turnout ~ `crisis type_civil unrest` + `crisis type_coup` +
             `crisis type_economic` + `crisis type_refugee` + `crisis type_regufee` + 
             `crisis type_soft coup` + `crisis type_terrorism` + `crisis type_war`
, data = election_all)
```
